sentences.english: There are many cases of human rights violations filed before the police.
sentences.chinese: 警方接手許多人權侵犯案件，往往牽連到高級官員。

sentences.english: International human-rights lawyers say these types of killings would likely constitute a war crime.
sentences.chinese: 國際人權律師說，這種殺人行爲可能會構成犯罪。

sentences.english: The issue of human rights is widely agitated.
sentences.chinese: 人權問題引起廣泛而激烈的辯論。

sentences.english: In addition, there have been concerns over how the council deals with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有人對人權理事會如何對待以色列表示關切。

sentences.english: Mine is on human rights; I think it's a pretty close fit.
sentences.chinese: 比如我研究的是人權，比較符合。

sentences.english: Once every four years the council subjects each U.N. member to scrutiny.
sentences.chinese: 人權理事會對每個聯合國成員國每四年會評估一次。

sentences.english: Since earlier this year, the game has been discussed by overseas-based human rights organizations.
sentences.chinese: 從今年年初開始，海外人權組織開始討論這款遊戲。

sentences.english: For human-rights activists and sympathizers of the Dalai Lama in Western countries, their actions can be called a failure.
sentences.chinese: 人權份子和西方噠賴的同情者們的舉動是失敗的。

sentences.english: The litigation right of the accused is the principal part and core of guaranteeing human rights.
sentences.chinese: 刑事被訴人的訴訟權利是人權保障的主體和核心。

sentences.english: It is the result of global non-colonization movement to confirm the collective human rights.
sentences.chinese: 對集體人權的確認，是全球性非殖民化運動的結果。

sentences.english: or make movies that bring awareness to it.
sentences.chinese: 要麼製作電影，宣傳人權保護意識。

sentences.english: Samer Muscati from Human Rights Watch described the outcome as disappointing.
sentences.chinese: 來自人權觀察組織的穆卡提認爲這個結果很令人失望。

sentences.english: They affirm some personal rights for the slave, but not all.
sentences.chinese: 他們肯定奴隸有一些人權，但不具備全部的。

sentences.english: Other team members include a military specialist and a human rights lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 其他小組成員有一位是軍事專家，一位是人權律師。

sentences.english: Material help right provides foundation and safeguard for the realization of other human rights.
sentences.chinese: 物質幫助權爲其它重要人權的實現提供了基礎和保障。

sentences.english: Do you think they can also contribute to democracy and human rights?
sentences.chinese: 你是否認爲他們也能爲民主與人權做出貢獻？

definition: to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
